question: Regarding a related alert, can you find the name of the account associated with the execution of a known malicious credential theft tool?
solution_steps: The email account with SID `S-5-7-21-1843151660-3234030288-105586167-1422` received an email with a malicious URL, which was later removed.
A malicious credential theft tool was executed by the account with the name `tgs2z`.
